connected with the form of a verb used when the subject is affected by the action of the verb, for example He was bitten by a dog.

relating to the way something, especially a language, has developed over time
completely without something; having lost something
sad and lonely because you have lost something

a coloured cream or powder that some people put on their cheeks (= on their faces below the eyes) to give them more colour

a robot
